Spain, Portugal & France from London | Carnival Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Spain, Portugal & France from London 13 Days | Dover (London) - Civitavecchia (Rome) Set sail on a spectacular 13-day journey through Europe’s most enchanting ports — a perfect blend of history, culture, and coastal beauty. Depart from Dover, where England’s White Cliffs meet the sea, and wake up in Le Havre, gateway to the romance of Paris. Enjoy relaxing Fun Days at Sea, filled with world-class dining, entertainment, and ocean views. Sip Bordeaux’s legendary wines in Le Verdon, discover avant-garde art in Bilbao, and marvel at Spain’s Tower of Hercules in La Coruña. Stroll through the colorful streets of Porto, and fall in love with Lisbon’s hilltop charm before heading to sun-soaked Málaga, where ancient history meets Mediterranean flair. Your unforgettable voyage ends in Civitavecchia (Rome) — the perfect start to exploring the Eternal City’s timeless wonders. Deal Details Travel Dates 30 Aug 26 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $2,655 per person Enquire Now Set sail on a spectacular 13-day journey through Europe’s most enchanting ports — a perfect blend of history, culture, and coastal beauty. Depart from Dover, where England’s White Cliffs meet the sea, and wake up in Le Havre, gateway to the romance of Paris. Enjoy relaxing Fun Days at Sea, filled with world-class dining, entertainment, and ocean views. Sip Bordeaux’s legendary wines in Le Verdon, discover avant-garde art in Bilbao, and marvel at Spain’s Tower of Hercules in La Coruña. Stroll through the colorful streets of Porto, and fall in love with Lisbon’s hilltop charm before heading to sun-soaked Málaga, where ancient history meets Mediterranean flair. Your unforgettable voyage ends in Civitavecchia (Rome) — the perfect start to exploring the Eternal City’s timeless wonders. Pricing Interior Stateroom (4A) from $2,655*pp twin share Oceanview Stateroom (6A) Pictured from $,3049*pp twin share Balcony Stateroom (8A) from $3,885*pp twin share What's Included A variety of room types, with options to sleep up to 5 people per room Stateroom attendant and daily turn-down service Great options for all six meals — breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon tea, dinner and late-night, that is — at the full-service Main Dining Room or the casual Lido Restaurant Specialty food spots for breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacking Lemonade, iced tea, hot chocolate, non-bottled water and non-specialty coffee and tea Amazing stage shows, live musical performances, stand-up comedy and more Clubs, bars and lounges featuring DJs spinning, karaoke, piano sing-alongs and more Deck parties, game shows, trivia contests and more fun ways to get involved A fully-stocked fitness center, plus outdoor sports activities Pools and hot tubs for all, plus an Adults-Only Retreat Itinerary Day 1 Dover (london) Day 2 Le Havre (Paris) 7.00am - 8.00pm Day 3 Fun Day at Sea Day 4 Le Verdon (Bordeaux) 8.00am - 5.00pm Day 5 Bilbao 7.00am - 4.00pm Day 6 La Coruna 9.00am - 6.00pm Day 7 Leixoes (Porto) 8.00am - 5.00pm Day 8 Lisbon 9.00am - 6.00pm Day 9 Fun Day at Sea Day 10 Malaga 8.00am - 6.00pm Day 11 Fun Day at Sea Day 12 Fun Day at Sea Day 13 Civitavecchia (Rome) Your Ship - Carnival Legend Legends aren’t born — they’re made. And over time, Carnival Legend® has truly lived up to its name. Start your story at RedFrog Pub®, where island vibes and signature brews flow freely, or take the plunge on Green Thunder, the slide built for bragging rights. Savor sushi perfection at Bonsai Sushi™, toast your own tale at Alchemy Bar®, or raise a glass to real heroes at the Heroes Tribute™ Bar. From a feast at Truffles Restaurant to poolside bites at Guy’s Burger Joint™ and BlueIguana Cantina™, every meal is a legend in the making. Treat yourself to an unforgettable evening at Fahrenheit 555 Steakhouse, where the flavor is as bold as the name. Unwind your way — whether at Cloud 9 Spa™, the serene adults-only Serenity Retreat™, or dancing after dark at Medusa’s Lair. Kids and teens can create their own epic adventures in our dedicated youth spaces, while grown-ups soak up the magic of Billie’s Piano Bar or the Camelot Pool. Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 17 October 25. From price is per person twin share valid for sale until 30 November 2025, unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Valid for new bookings only. Not combinable with other offers. Supplements apply for higher room grades, categories and fare types. Some rooms have obstructed views. Offer ends 30-11-25 unless sold out prior. Offer is available on select Carnival sailings a through July 2028. Advertised fares are available until allocation is exhausted and may fluctuate. ~50% Reduced Deposits: non-refundable, per person/twin share. 2-3 day sailings: $50pp, 4-5 day sailings: $75pp, 6-9 day sailings: $125pp, 10+ day sailings: $200pp. Remainder of the standard deposit and final payment for all guests is due on final payment due date. Offer is not valid for bookings made within the final payment period. ^Onboard Credit (OBC) if applicable is per room, in AUD and applied to the first 2 guests in the room only. Amount varies by itinerary duration as specified. For cruises 2-5 days: $100pp (up to $200 per room). For cruises 6+ days: $200pp (up to $400 per room). OBC expires at the conclusion of your cruise, is not refundable, transferable, redeemable for cash. All travel is subject to the Carnival Cruise Line. Ships' Registry: The Bahamas and Panama. Experience the world differently.
